page.title: 09INDUSTRY THE SAWMILL.
page.content: The industry of TROON would be incomplete without a text on the SAWMILL. This branch of heavy industry was vital to the expansion of the sea/faring port.The founder was ADAM WILSON.He became a saw/doctor with the TROON SHIPBUILDING CO. but longed to work with timber.His first sawmill was at SORN in 1856 then on to TROON.The dream became a reality. By the year 1913 the now large sawmill was within felling distance of the shipyard and the future looked secure.Then came the holocaust of WORLD WAR 1.The most important single factor on the timber industry was the degree of control the MINISTRY OF SUPPLY had over its work.However to this day THE SAWMILL is still a major employer in the town.The emphasis is now concentrated on the construction of TIMBER FRAMED houses.
